alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL POLK COUNTY THROUGH 130 PM CDT... At 100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saylorville, or 5 miles north of Des Moines, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Ankeny, Altoona, Bondurant, Saylorville, Adventureland Amusement Park, Prairie Meadows, Iowa Events Center, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Margo Frankel Woods State Park, Ankeny Regional Airport, and Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 87 and 92. Interstate 80 between mile markers 133 and 144. Interstate 235 between mile markers 6 and 8, and between mile markers 12 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
